title: transaction in the middle time becomes empty when debug_traceTransaction
body:
An example  , masked  all curl to localhost (not for public call
occur on  0xpolygon/erigon:0.0.8 but not sure it's from upstream or not

`Jun-30-2023 08:03:34 PM +UTC - become empty`  `{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":2741,"result":null}` <= this is the problem
curl --location 'localhost:8545' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"method":"debug_traceTransaction","params":["0x0ff27d4c80f4b1612ad26271d2e0381c3995e1922f5810a23a72518653ee7d04",{"tracer":"callTracer","timeout":"1000s"}],"id":2741,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}'


`Mar-26-2023 04:37:08 AM +UTC - can trace with some retuen` 
curl --location 'localhost:8545' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"method":"debug_traceTransaction","params":["0xe7db455f9eb55431245b6c99518e14e7f8cb770245641d5a57a5099e5f3bb278",{"tracer":"callTracer","timeout":"1000s"}],"id":2741,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}'

`Jul-05-2023 09:43:44 AM +UTC - can trace with some retuen`
curl --location 'localhost:8545' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --data '{"method":"debug_traceTransaction","params":["0xb0032a1244c7ac477ac5717aa366ba282b87300f48794f870c8ce71c2185ea17",{"tracer":"callTracer","timeout":"1000s"}],"id":2741,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}'


node is always in archive mode of erigon, and it has block/tx for later block as demonstrated above
